const Recommend = ({ show, data, setGenre, books }) => { if (!show) { return null } setGenre(data.me.favouriteGenre) console.log('boooks: ', books) return (

recommendations

books in your favorite genre {data?.me.favouriteGenre}

{books.map((a) => ( ))}
author published
{a.title} {a.author.name} {a.published}
) } export default Recommend
